Title: Directs the department of health to assign at least 1 narcotics investigator to each county in a city having a population of one million or more
Summary: Directs the department of health to assign at least 1 narcotics investigator to each county in a city having a population of one million or more.
LawCode: Amd ยง3385, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to requiring the department of health to assign at least one investigator of the bureau of narcotics enforcement to each county within a city having a population of one million or more
